description:
Long enough to cover the top of armour, short enough to keep the air flowing. Not a tee, not a full sleeve, with its ¾ sleeve the Optic finds that Goldilocks zone of comfort and coverage. Designed with articulated patterning, this shirt flows with you when the seat’s dropped and you’re becoming one with the trail.

  • Polyester dries quickly and breathes well
  • Antimicrobial treatment keeps the funk to your pre-ride playlist
  • Paneled construction is comfy in the climb and out of the way when you’re focusing on bike-body separation
  • Drop-tail hem adds extra coverage from trail spray
  • UPF 40+ protection, blocking more than 97% of harsh UV
  • 7mesh has a crash replacement program, so if you damage your gear within the first 30 days of purchase, 7mesh will (at their discretion) repair or replace your item. They can even help you keep your old gear going, helping to repair crashed apparel, charging only a small fee to cover the service
name: 7mesh Optic Shirt - Men's
